name: PhliptonSmartHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Connect Alexa to Phlipton products in a few simple steps:
1. Download Phlipton app for Android or iOS.
2. Register your account in the Phlipton app.
3. Configure you device on the “Phlipton” app and name your device as it will be used in Phlipton Smart Home skill. e.g. bedroom light, living room tv, office fan, geyser plug, etc.
4. Once you have configured your echo with the Alexa app, search for the 'Phlipton Smart Home' skill in your alexa app in your phone.
5. Click 'Enable Skill' of Phlipton Smart Home, and you will be redirected to the Phlipton Login page.
6. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
7. Setup has been completed. Now you can close that page
8.Now you can discover devices and look for them in your device section in your Alexa app.

Light Controls:
"Alexa, turn on living room light"
"Alexa, turn off living room light"
"Alexa, dim bedroom light"
"Alexa, brighten bedroom light"
"Alexa, set the office room light to 20 percent"

Color Control:
"Alexa, set bedroom light to yellow"
"Alexa, set bedroom light to warm white"
"Alexa, set bedroom light to blue"
Ir Gateway Control
"Alexa, set bedroom tv to one one one"
"Alexa, higher bedroom tv volume"
Plugs:
* Alexa, turn on my plug
* Alexa, turn off my plug
